author.description: The id for the author of the object.

date.description: The date the object was published.

date_gmt.description: The date the object was published, as GMT.

guid.description: GUID for the object, as it exists in the database.

modified.description: The date the object was last modified.

modified_gmt.description: The date the object was last modified, as GMT.

parent.description: The id for the parent of the object.

slug.description: An alphanumeric identifier for the object unique to its type.

title.description: Title for the object, as it exists in the database.

content.description: Content for the object, as it exists in the database.

excerpt.description: Excerpt for the object, as it exists in the database.
